headline: Will Robust Recurring Revenue and Earnings Growth Change Intuitive Surgical’s (ISRG) Investment Narrative?
summary: Intuitive Surgical recently reported continued double-digit revenue and earnings growth, with procedure volumes and global da Vinci installations remaining strong even as hospital capital spending showed some unevenness. An interesting aspect is that a significant portion of the company’s revenue now comes from recurring sources like servicing and supplies, underscoring the stability and predictability of its business model. We'll explore how robust recurring revenues and positive earnings...
